title: Mosque of al-Maḥmūdiyya
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosquée El-Mahmoudieh (près de la citadelle). Translation of photographer's description: Mosque of El-Mahmoudyah (near the citadel). Collector's note: A.H. 975 (1567).
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
